website_summaries.verdict: A worry-free option to set up backseat tablet-based viewing, because this cleverly designed car tablet holder will definitely fit your vehicle’s headrest.
pros: Tightly grasps 5 to 11 inch sized tablets
Its Velcro design takes seconds to set up
Snug strap style keeps tablets from vibrating or bouncing for a superior viewing experience
cons: Although most will be able to comfortably watch a mounted tablet from the back seat, there are no rotation options to create the ultimate viewing angle

customer_reviews.title: Good for a non-adjustable headrest..
customer_reviews.text: We have a ford truck with non-adjustable headrests. Needless to say there are very few options. This product did the trick. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: mattzone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 2020 Lincoln Navigator tablet mount
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a way to hang a table for our son in our car , we had a little to non options because the Perfect 2020 Lincoln Navigator Have a very strange headrest that it’s not possible to use the regular mount that we used to use because it’s not a regular headrest. We are using this with amazon fire 8 inches but it will easily fit a larger size table like the iPad. We are very pleased, the materials are very good quality. I have to just say I didn’t receive anything for free or in a discount to write a review, I am just a very pleased costumer .
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: A must have for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this for a 7+ hour drive with my toddler. The brackets that hold the tablet on are velcro and can be moved to best fit your device. It means it can also be portrait or horizontal. The strap for the headrest can also go either around the sides or around it vertically. Super strong velcro held everything in place no problem, even the kid kicking the seat.
customer_reviews.author: A. Craft

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to hold an iPad for my toddler to watch on load road trips. It works as advertised. I was very pleasantly surprised when I went to reattach the mirror that allows me to see her while driving. I’ve always had trouble with the mirror staying in place but I set the bottom of the mirror into the mount and it worked perfectly. I can’t say this would work for everyone but it made me feel like I was getting more for my money this time.
customer_reviews.author: T P

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: You defiantly need a case for it or it’ll slid from side to side in your car. Otherwise it’s decent.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Took Maneuvering But Got Full Size iPad to Work!!
customer_reviews.text: Glad it fit the rental car and while it did take maneuvering we did finally get it to work. Would have helped if there was a longer patch of velcro to adjust the hooks on both top and bottom. It was kind of a bear to get it on. :0) Also, took, I guess...LoL... a bit of a turn and had to pull over I think just twice to get it back on. I'll remember that on the way back and probably try and put something so it is more secure. May be because I have the big iPad, I'm sure...just noting. Otherwise, great product. Very portable which is what I liked.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for long trips with the kids
customer_reviews.text: We have really used this tablet holder since we got it. It helps keep the kiddos at bay when we are driving. The only thing I would change about it is to add 2 more velcro holders, so there's one on all 4 sides of the tablet. the 2 work ok, but tablet can slide out if a sharp turn is required. 2 more holders would prevent a tablet from becoming projectile. Otherwise, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T.M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ok...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really grip the tablet. My daughter has an Ipad mini that I bought this for and it's just ok. She barely used it on the road trip. I didn't feel like going through the returns process, so I kept it. Wouldn't buy another.
customer_reviews.author: LiciaYvette

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have to keep the lil ones entertained while on thee Road😃
customer_reviews.text: Ohhh... the moment Hubby and I installed both tablet holders to both driver and passenger head rests... our two lil ones enjoyed they’re tablets more with the tablet holders they were truly in tuned with what they were watching... neither tablet fell from the tablet holder while I hit a few bumps and dodged a few pot holes in my city lol!! I Give this product a 10 out of 10 A Must Have to keep the lil ones entertained while on thee Road😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Roadtrip and Baby Approved
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this holder for a family roadtrip to keep our 1 year old occupied. It did the job but our baby wasn't interested in being in his seat! It was the perfect eye view considering our SUV seats. It held his Amazon Kindle Fire 10. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arica Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t had an issue
customer_reviews.text: Don’t wast your money on any other product. The holder is completely adjustable I swear this isn’t an ad. I can use this for my phone, iPad, and kindle. My kid loves watching shows in the car even on a quick trip to the grocery store or trips out of town 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ThunderQueen

customer_reviews.title: When changing vehicles, you may have to change the direction of the fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use my tablet in the car for my rear facing niece. She hates the seat because she is not turned around. She loves Bay Bum and now she has no problem sitting and seeing the tablet. I love it! The only problem I have is when transferring to another vehicle, the length is to short. All headrest are different so you have to move the pieces constantly to fit whichever vehicle I am in. The only thing I would change is making that about 2 inches longer and it would be perfect. Would I buy it again, most definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Stretch Like It Says
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t stretch NEARLY as far as advertised. Everything else is good. It’s extremely well made and can hold my iPad. But I needed it to stretch and it barely fits around a headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy79

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about it
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to assemble but it doesn’t feel very sturdy because there’s nothing on the ends to hold the tablet in place. All it has is the two holders, one on top and one on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: It served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I thought it looked better in the picture. It did have strong adhesive Velcro and overall it served its purpose on our road trip. It just seemed dinky when it arrived
customer_reviews.author: tgsw

customer_reviews.title: Its super
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My little guy enjoys car rides much more when he can watch super monsters during. I was having a hard time finding one to work with the back seats in my truck because hes rear facing and the headrests aren't removable. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Handy & Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy gadget. Was nice to have the tablet to make sure my little one could last on a road trip. Just be sure when you take the tablet off that you don’t fling off one of the holders! They’re attached to the Velcro, so they can come off. Thankfully I found it in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This was a godsend of a purchase. It works well with an iPad for car trips. Would certainly recommend to anyone with littles or teens for travel
customer_reviews.author: Karie D

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Works well with both iPads and fire hd kids edition. Had to flex the mount a little for the fire hd kids with the case onnit
customer_reviews.author: RMM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for family trips!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product knowing that some of the reviews were super negative. We drove 20 hrs with 4 kids and let me just say, Wow!! I will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: mdw

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my wife traveling across country with our 2 year old. Held an iPad perfectly, because of the open design it didn’t overheat, and could keep it charged the entire way
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Makens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an iPad so my toddler can watch a movie on road trips. Very durable and easy to use. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if it fits.
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made. If it fit, this would be a 5 star review based on preliminary material, construction and overall quality review.
customer_reviews.author: Sybarite

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Guys my I pad perfectly without any parts sticking out bothering me while I’m driving. I’ve had one that would get caught in my hair and clothes this one doesn’t! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sussie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, useful product!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for mounting iPad onto headrest. My son uses his car seat rear facing and I use this to mount the ipad on headrest. It doesn't fall off and iPad is secure.
customer_reviews.author: mrsmjx

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, not bulky and seems to be very secure and stable. I have a galaxy 9" tablet which fits perfect, but not with the case. Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann I

customer_reviews.title: It was what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2006 Ford F-350 truck has molded headrests so we had to be creative in order to secure the portable DVD players for our children. The velcros were rigid and strong and the headrest sat nicely, tight and secure. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bud O'Bayley

customer_reviews.title: A great addition for long road trips
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and it holds our iPad up great. We could fit our phone in it, but it slides out when turning. Great for long road trips, and very easy to figure out
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Fits multiple devices!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my tablet! Its adjustable so it will fit multiple size devices. My 6 month old hates the carseat so this has helped SOOOO much to keep her calm and distracted with out having to buy an entire DVD set up. I also dont have a adjustable head rest so being able to change from vertical to horizontal is amazing! Will buy again for our other car! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for multiple sized tablets
customer_reviews.text: The perfect tablet holder in a car to keep it out of kids hands but available for them to watch movies or shows!
customer_reviews.author: Angie M. Nunley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a charger that has no headrest. With a one year old this is difficult.... until i found this. I LOVE it! The velcro attaches to the back of my car under the window.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. So far no issues. They are easy to use and move around.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and worked great with my iPad!! Shocked at how sturdy this was too!! Son was able to watch movies on the iPad while on a small trip and never bounced around or moved any while traveling. Definitely worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t heard complaints from the back seat yet, so I’m assuming this product is great!
customer_reviews.author: mamaetluc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Although I had to figure out how to set it up, I love this product. It has been a life saver when we take our road trips, keeps my great nephew occupied the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This works great for non conventional headrests. Also love that it folds up small and flat. It adjusts to phones and tablets of different sizes
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: The Macally Tablet car headrest  is great for road trips
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, however if you have long hair sit on the opposite side of the headrest. If you lean forward your hair will get caught on the velcro
customer_reviews.author: Shantrell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ipad mini kept sliding out every time the car turned. It doesn’t hold it tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Crespo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for the little ones in the car! I used my Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 10.1 and found it to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Reneé

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. My 6 year old uses it for her iPad when she is in the car. She can remove and put her iPad on her own. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It slides out on turns and bumps. Has no support on the sides to keep from sliding out.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy into install and figure out how to use BUT it slides out on turns or on exits. So I have to stuff something behind it to try to tighten it. There is no support to keep it from sliding out when you hit a bump or turn. So you have no option but to drive very slow on turns or exits so the tablet doesn’t go flying into the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Klaudia

customer_reviews.title: great for car trips
customer_reviews.text: This headrest is perfect for car trips with the ipad. My son does not do great in the car on long trips and this definitely helps to play shows and watch movies.
customer_reviews.author: ag3211

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a car tablet holder for the longest time that would fit the non adjustable head seats in our 2015 Nissan Altima for our son that is still rear facing. It this is just perfect! We can place our phones, his tablet and iPad. Should’ve bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: We did not care for this product and it’s very cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to get the tablet it but once it’s in its golden
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great holder for a car that doesn’t have an adjustable headrest
customer_reviews.author: Teresa K.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a life saver for long road trips with toddlers and kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Rothford

customer_reviews.title: Tablet slides out when turning
customer_reviews.text: Works generally on highway trips, but once you get off the highway your ipad slides out when you take a hard turn
customer_reviews.author: S Kells

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good buy, but I have to take the iPad out of all protective casing to install.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product very easy to use, and holds electronic very secure. Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for remote learning on the go
customer_reviews.text: We got two surface pros and kids where delighted to read, listen and use them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Trogub

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Was easily installed on the head rest. Worked great with my life proof case on iPad Air.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Klingenfus

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it! Falls apart very easily does not hold the i pad in a steady way! Very shaky
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! I've used a Samsung tablet and an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: CS1992

customer_reviews.title: Fits all size headrests
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well in all size headrests. Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lee

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold well at all. iPad always slips out. I’m afraid it’ll hit my daughter. So I just stopped using it
customer_reviews.author: Samuel le

customer_reviews.title: Umm no go
customer_reviews.text: Make a left or right turn and this will most definitely have your tablet on the floor .. won’t grip ipad without a case
customer_reviews.author: Tany Tan

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a side stopper to help tablet not slide off in sharp turns
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling and easy adjusting. Tablet with out cases will slide off if you take sharp turns
customer_reviews.author: Gab

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Fits our tablet, works great in the car for keeping kids happy on long drives
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Covered in Mold
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for a road trip for my kids and both of them arrived covered in mold. So gross
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sturdiness and ease of use but wish it held the iPad WITH my child’s cover. Was a bit disruptive to have to take the cover on and off
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Velcro isn’t strong enough and iPad is constantly falling out and onto my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the car! Excellent on long road trips, and can even handle phones, although they may slip out via the sides. Sturdy, sticky grips and the velcro seems strong.
customer_reviews.author: VinnieDeRight

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install my son does not like to be alone in the backseat so I put a tablet that he can watch his shows or listen to music entertains him very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very handy. Fits in both of my cars (small and big).
customer_reviews.author: milena olszewska

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this !!! And I think my baby loved it even more. Drove 4 hours to Sarasota and my baby didn’t complain once.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. But for me not worth it my kids iPad just slides out whenever I break.

customer_reviews.title: Worked out perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fit the head rest great. Was perfect fit for my LG tablet!

customer_reviews.title: It's fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my daughters tablet so she can watch her Bubble Guppies!!

customer_reviews.title: It’s adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Just how it looks on the image it’s AWSOME it’s Velcro and it adjusts to the length or width of any phone or tablet.... as soon as I got it tried it out and it worked marvelous.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Holds iPad perfectly and easy to use. I’ve ordered more since using this one, so we have them in both vehicles.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for our long car ride for our 7 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Easy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it’s supposed to do! Very helpful for the car!

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, I ordered this to hold an iPad to entertain a child in a rear facing car seat and it worked perfectly!

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Did not keep iPad in place while driving, especially with turns. I returned it.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and doesn’t rattle like the previous iPad holder.

customer_reviews.text: I have an iPad Pro 12.9 and is hard to adjust the Velcro. Once you figure it out it holds the iPad sturdy.

product_meta.title: Macally Headrest Tablet Holder for Car - Adjustable Strap, Fits Most Headrests - Great for Driving with Kids in Backseat - Tablet and iPad Car Holder for 5” to 11” Screens - Quick and Easy Install
product_meta.description: The Macally HRSTRAPMOUNT is an iPad car mount that is made from stain-resistant, elasticated material with repositionable clips to hold your tablet securely in place. The tablet car mount's unique and strong system allows the HRSTRAPMOUNT to hold your tablet in both portrait and landscape viewing angles with ease and is perfect for keeping your passengers entertained on long road trips.
feature_bullets: PEACEFUL DRIVING FOR EVERYONE: Keep your children or other backseat passengers entertained on long drives and avoid paying for expensive backseat entertainment systems with our headrest tablet mount for car.
UNIVERSAL FIT FOR TABLETS: The headrest table mount easily fits any tablet up to 8.75” wide (screen sizes from 5” - 11”)

EASY SETUP WITH ULTRA SECURE HOLD: The adjustable strap of the iPad holder for car headrest for kids takes seconds to attach/detach to the back of the headrest and secures it from sudden jerks, sharp turns, and away from kicking feet.
PORTABLE & COMPACT FOR EASY TRAVEL: The low-profile design of the tablet holder for car allows parents to fold up and easily store the tablet car mount in their bags and transfer from car to car.
WHAT YOU GET: Along with our car tablet holder with a quick setup guide, you will also receive friendly LIFETIME SUPPORT, 2-year warranty, and hassle-free returns.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars400 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
